item.title: DataViz Makeover 02
item.dc:creator: Archie Dolit
item.description: The task for this makeover is to propose **interactive visualisation** for the infographics by Department of Statistics, Singapore (DOS). The details can be found [here](https://isss608.netlify.app/dataviz/dataviz2).

item.title: DataViz Makeover 01
item.dc:creator: Archie Dolit
item.description:
The task for this makeover is to propose alternative data visualisation for the Merchandise Trade by Region/Market data provided by Department of Statistics, Singapore (DOS). The details can be found [here](https://isss608.netlify.app/dataviz/dataviz1).
Through this data visualisation makeover, the principles of graphic design particularly the rules for encoding the values in graph, practical guides for using color in charts, and data-ink were applied; while hopefully preventing junk charts. Additionally, data understanding, graphical integrity, and data story annotations were also put into practice.
